column1:
Odeinoichus,"2015-12-15T21:45:20.523Z","Slightly Mediocre, but no less Fun Polybag","

Set #30115 Jungle Boat: This little polybag is a set from the Jungle Rescue Sub-Theme of the Friends line and it’s a pretty straight forward looking model/set without much to say. So let’s go over the pros and cons of this little set.

column2: The model in this set is a decent sort. A nice little motor boat for Olivia to pilot and doesn’t use any bad design choices. Includes lime green pieces and rose flower tops.
Walkie-talkie piece is in orange, unique new colour.
Olivia Mini-Doll has no unique prints and isn’t too special.
Limited accessories to play with for Olivia.
Set works better as an addition to the larger Jungle Rescue sets.

column1: I would still recommend this set as a decent little polybag. The boat model itself is a fun little build and includes a nice new colour for the old walkie talkie accessory. It is however a bit weak in the choice of mini-doll piece, Olivia’s legs are quite common in the colour scheme chosen here and her top doesn’t match well with them. Still I’m certain the younger builders will enjoy mixing and matching mini-doll parts.

,TRUE,2,2,2,2,2 KingAlanI","2016-02-10T05:54:05.2Z","Cute little Friends set that blends in with other LEGO","

Friends sets often fit in with traditional sets on a similar topic, and this does that particularly well. There are lots of boats and animals in the LEGO world. Lime is one of my favorite rare colors, and it doesn't clash as much as some pastels.
The bag seemed bigger than necessary for the contents. Even for a small set, the build was easy to follow.

The footrest really secures the figure; I love this since minidolls often have trouble staying put. The lilypad layout was nice but the frog could've more distinctly looked like a frog. Having the radio be bright light orange was nice for some variety.
A nice addition to my small minidoll collection.
Very straightforward even for a small set.
It shows modern streamlined design compared to 1990's #6508 Wave Racer.
A good polybag, but not the greatest.
